alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Barry (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 6:52AM EDT until May 07 at 7:45AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Allegan County in southwestern Michigan... Barry County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 745 AM EDT. * At 651 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Martin, or 14 miles west of Hastings, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Hastings... Wayland... Middleville... Nashville... Martin... Orangeville... Irving... Assyria... Woodland... Delton... Bradley... Banfield... Gun Lake... Yankee Springs... Hastings City Barry ... Prairieville... Dowling... Pine Lake... Shelbyville... Cloverdale... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
